targets.query:
SELECT SUM(*) FROM
(SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
WHERE diff > 0
GROUP BY "host", time($interval)

SELECT SUM(*) FROM
(SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
WHERE diff > 0
GROUP BY "host", time($interval)

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "bytes_free" AS "free", "bytes_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' AND "fs" = '$fs_name' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_bytes_free" AS "free", "mean_bytes_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' AND "fs" = '$fs_name'  AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "files_free" AS "free", "files_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' AND "fs" = '$fs_name' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_files_free" AS "free", "mean_files_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' AND "fs" = '$fs_name'  AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "files_free" AS "free", "files_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  "kind" = 'MDT' AND "fs" = '$fs_name' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_files_free" AS "free", "mean_files_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "kind" = 'MDT' AND "fs" = '$fs_name'  AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "bytes_free" AS "free", "bytes_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  kind = 'OST' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_bytes_free" AS "free", "mean_bytes_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  kind = 'OST' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

panels.description: Metadata Operations for a particular filesystem

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM
(SELECT SUM("diff") FROM ( SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "units"='reqs' AND "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" =~ /close|getattr|getxattr|link|mkdir|mknod|open|rename|rmdir|setattr|statfs|unlink/ AND "fs" = '$fs_name' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target", "name" ) GROUP BY time($interval), "name"),
(SELECT SUM("diff") FROM ( SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE "units"='reqs' AND "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" =~ /close|getattr|getxattr|link|mkdir|mknod|open|rename|rmdir|setattr|statfs|unlink/ AND "fs" = '$fs_name' AND time < now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target", "name" ) GROUP BY time($interval), "name")
 GROUP BY "name"
SELECT ((last("bytes_total") - last("bytes_free")) / last("bytes_total") * 100) AS "foo" FROM "target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' group by target

panels.description: OST Balance for a particular filesystem

targets.query: SELECT ((last("bytes_total") - last("bytes_free")) / last("bytes_total") * 100) AS "foo" FROM "target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' AND "fs" = '$fs_name' GROUP BY target

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT difference("sum") FROM "target" WHERE "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target),
(SELECT "mean_diff_sum" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target)
GROUP BY target

panels.description: Metadata Operations for a particular target

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM
(SELECT difference("samples") FROM "target" WHERE "units"='reqs' AND "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" =~ /close|getattr|getxattr|link|mkdir|mknod|open|rename|rmdir|setattr|statfs|unlink/ AND "target" = '$target_name' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE "units"='reqs' AND "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" =~ /close|getattr|getxattr|link|mkdir|mknod|open|rename|rmdir|setattr|statfs|unlink/ AND "target" = '$target_name' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name")
GROUP BY "name"

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT difference("sum") FROM target where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target),
(SELECT "mean_diff_sum" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target)
GROUP BY target

panels.description: File Inode Usage for a particular target

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "files_free" AS "free", "files_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  "target"='$target_name'  AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_files_free" AS "free", "mean_files_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE "target"='$target_name' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT difference("samples") FROM target where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target)
GROUP BY target

panels.description: Space Usage for a particular target

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "bytes_free" AS "free", "bytes_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  "target"='$target_name'  AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_bytes_free" AS "free", "mean_bytes_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE "target"='$target_name' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT difference("samples") FROM target where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target)
GROUP BY target

panels.description: CPU Usage for a particular server

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT mean("cpu_iowait") / mean("cpu_total") * 100 FROM "node" WHERE  "host"='$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT mean("mean_cpu_iowait") / mean("mean_cpu_total") * 100 FROM "long_term"."node" WHERE  "host"='$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT mean("cpu_system") / mean("cpu_total") * 100 FROM "node" WHERE  "host"='$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT mean("mean_cpu_system") / mean("mean_cpu_total") * 100 FROM "long_term"."node" WHERE  "host"='$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT mean("cpu_user") / mean("cpu_total") * 100 FROM "node" WHERE  "host"='$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT mean("mean_cpu_user") / mean("mean_cpu_total") * 100 FROM "long_term"."node" WHERE  "host"='$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT SUM(*) FROM
(SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target"),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target")
WHERE "diff" > 0
GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT SUM(*) FROM
(SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target"),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target")
WHERE "diff" > 0
GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.description: Read/Write IOPS for a specific target

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT difference("samples") FROM "target" WHERE  "name" = 'read_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d),
(SELECT "mean_diff_samples" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "name" = 'read_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT -difference("samples") FROM "target" WHERE  "name" = 'write_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d),
(SELECT -"mean_diff_samples" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "name" = 'write_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT SUM(*) FROM
(SELECT difference("sum") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target),
(SELECT "mean_diff_sum" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'read_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target)
WHERE "diff" > 0
GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT SUM(*) FROM
(SELECT difference("sum") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target),
(SELECT "mean_diff_sum" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" where "kind"='OST'  AND "name" = 'write_bytes' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target)
WHERE "diff" > 0
GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.description: Read/Write Bandwidth for a specific target

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT difference("sum") FROM "target" WHERE  "name" = 'read_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d),
(SELECT "mean_diff_sum" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "name" = 'read_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT -difference("sum") FROM "target" WHERE  "name" = 'write_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d),
(SELECT -"mean_diff_sum" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "name" = 'write_bytes' AND "target" = '$target_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT SUM(*) FROM
  (SELECT SUM("diff") FROM 
    (SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "units"='reqs' AND "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" =~ /close|getattr|getxattr|link|mkdir|mknod|open|rename|rmdir|setattr|statfs|unlink/ AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target","name")
  GROUP BY time($interval),"name"),
  (SELECT SUM("diff") FROM
    (SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE "units"='reqs' AND "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" =~ /close|getattr|getxattr|link|mkdir|mknod|open|rename|rmdir|setattr|statfs|unlink/ AND time < now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target","name")
  GROUP BY time($interval),"name")
GROUP BY time($interval),"name"

panels.description: Memory and Swap Usage for a particular server

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT mean("mem_total") * 1024 FROM "node" WHERE  "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT mean("mean_mem_total") * 1024 FROM "long_term"."node" WHERE "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT mean("mem_total") * 1024  - mean("mem_free") * 1024 FROM "node" WHERE  "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT mean("mean_mem_total") * 1024  - mean("mean_mem_free") * 1024 FROM "long_term"."node" WHERE "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT mean("swap_total") * 1024 FROM "node" WHERE  "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT mean("mean_swap_total") * 1024 FROM "long_term"."node" WHERE "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT mean("swap_total") * 1024  - mean("swap_free") * 1024 FROM "node" WHERE  "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT mean("mean_swap_total") * 1024  - mean("mean_swap_free") * 1024 FROM "long_term"."node" WHERE "host" = '$host_name' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d)

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "files_free" AS "free", "files_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_files_free" AS "free", "mean_files_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "kind" = 'MDT' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

panels.description: Read/Write Bandwidth for a particular server

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM
(SELECT SUM("diff") FROM (SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "name" = 'read_bytes' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target") GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT SUM("diff") FROM (SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE "name" = 'read_bytes' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target")
GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT -SUM("diff") FROM (SELECT difference("samples") AS "diff" FROM "target" WHERE "name" = 'write_bytes' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT -SUM("diff") FROM (SELECT "mean_diff_samples" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE "name" = 'write_bytes' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY target)
GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM 
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "files_free" AS "free", "files_total" AS "total" FROM "target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval)),
(SELECT 100*(mean("total") - mean("free"))/mean("total") FROM ( SELECT "mean_files_free" AS "free", "mean_files_total" AS "total" FROM "long_term"."target" WHERE  "kind" = 'OST' AND "name" = '' AND $timeFilter AND time < now() - 1d GROUP BY target) GROUP BY time($interval))

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT difference("recv_count") AS "diff" FROM "lnet" WHERE "nid" != '0@lo' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "nid"),
(SELECT "mean_diff_recv" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."lnet" WHERE "nid" != '0@lo' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "nid")
GROUP BY "nid"

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT -difference("send_count") AS "diff" FROM "lnet" WHERE "nid" != '0@lo' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time > now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "nid"),
(SELECT -"mean_diff_send" AS "diff" FROM "long_term"."lnet" WHERE "nid" != '0@lo' AND "host"='$host_name' AND time <= now() - 1d AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "nid")
GROUP BY "nid"
